metadata.title: CVE-2023-52837 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nbd: fix uaf in nbd_openCommit 4af5f2e03013 ("nbd: use blk_mq_alloc_disk andblk_cleanup_disk") cleans up disk by blk_cleanup_disk() and it won't setdisk->private_data as NULL as before. UAF may be triggered in nbd_open()if someone tries to open nbd device right after nbd_put() since nbd hasbeen free in nbd_dev_remove().Fix this by implementing ->free_disk and free private data in it.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
